author: Jason E. Clapham
description: Cognac-laced and herbal with hints of liquorice, Pied-à-terre (which translates from French to mean 'foot on the ground') makes for a great after-dinner digestif.
name: Pied-à-terre
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
